\n\nGolden Waffle Breakfast Sandwich@Tue.recipe:
Ingredients: 
- 2 eggs
- 2 waffles
- 6 slices bacon

Instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 425 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
3. Place the bacon on the baking sheet and bake in preheated oven for 12-14 minutes, or until crispy. 
4. Meanwhile, in a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat, scramble the eggs until they are cooked through.
5. Place the waffles in a toaster and toast until golden brown.
6. Plate the eggs, waffles, and bacon and serve. Enjoy!
\n\nGolden Waffle Breakfast Sandwich@Tue.title: Golden Waffle Breakfast Sandwich

\n\nSavory Tomato and Egg Bake@Tue Dec 0.recipe:
Ingredients: 
- 4 eggs
- 2 tomatoes
- 2 tablespoons of olive oil
- 1 teaspoon of garlic powder
- 1 teaspoon of onion powder
- Salt and pepper to taste

Instructions: 
1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit.
2. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
3. Crack the eggs into the skillet and season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Stir constantly until the eggs are cooked through.
4. Slice the tomatoes into thin slices and add them to the skillet. Continue to cook until tomatoes are softened.
5. Grease an 8x8 baking dish and add the egg and tomato mixture into the dish.
6. Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until the eggs are set and lightly browned.
7. Serve and enjoy!
\n\nSavory Tomato and Egg Bake@Tue Dec 0.title: Savory Tomato and Egg Bake
